name: Diaper Bank
description: Diaper Bank program for new parents and caregivers provides a monthly box of free diapers (sizes 1-6) and baby wipes for eligible families.
fullDescription: Diaper Bank program for new parents and caregivers provides a monthly box of free diapers (sizes 1-6) and baby wipes for eligible families.
whatTheyOffer: Diaper Bank program for new parents and caregivers provides a monthly box of free diapers (sizes 1-6) and baby wipes for eligible families.
howToGetIt: For more information or to enroll in the Diaper Bank program, contact cm@hcnkids.org.
